name: Megaman Witter's Domination
description:
Megaman: Witter's Domination

Gameplay: An action platformer fangame where you run, shoot, jump, slide and collect special weapon after defeating bosses known as Robot Masters. There are 2 playable characters - Megaman, a robot using mostly ranged weapons and a close combat fighter named Slizer who is learning various abilities. Also you can find a secret challenge on each level that rewards with some form of boost.

Plot: A city is under attack! Megaman rushes to investigate and soon enough he meets a ninja like dude who is being suspected for this attack. However they find out that a mysterious man named Witter wishes to conquer the world who is throwing chaos around the globe. Megaman and Slizer join forces, visit different parts of the world to put things in place but also go through some wacky light-hearted moments.

Note: Check options and do any necessary configurations like keyboard/gamepad configuration
